entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 1:00 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: W 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
